description: Rab's versatile, all-season, Matrix™ softshell pant is ideal for trekking, hiking and outdoor adventures. With classic five pocket styling, this pant combines performance and style, offering comfort, breathability and great freedom of movement.
name: Rab Capstone AS Pants, Reg - Mens

specs.value: Matrix™ Double Weave Outer Fabric with Soft Brushed Back and Fluorocarbon-free DWR - 207 g
